name: Astrolix
description:
It's a simple 2D top-down vertical space shooter.

My first finished game.
Used it to learn the Gogot game engine.

It was made with touch and mobile phones in mind thus the vertical orientation.
But it can be played with a controller or the keyboard on windows.

Use the arrow keys to move, space to fire.
If you use touch or the mouse just drag to move, it has auto-fire.

Hope you enjoy it!
